title: AI-Powered Email Digest System
subtitle: n8n + Google Sheets + Gemini AI + Telegram
description: Automated workflow that summarizes inbox and sends clean digests to Telegram every hour. Features IMAP integration, Google Sheets logging, Gemini AI summarization, and Telegram notifications.

title: Serverless Contact Form with AWS + Netlify
subtitle: AWS Lambda + API Gateway + DynamoDB
description: Fully serverless contact form system with Netlify frontend, AWS API Gateway, Lambda, and DynamoDB. Secure, scalable, and cost-efficient solution without managing servers.

title: AI Resume Analyzer
subtitle: Python + Streamlit + PyPDF2
description: Web application that analyzes resumes against job descriptions, providing matching scores, missing keywords, and actionable insights to optimize job applications.

title: IT Internship Finder Bot
subtitle: Python, Firebase, Telegram
description: An automated Python bot that finds and notifies about the latest IT internships from multiple job boards and RSS feeds. Features include scraping global and India-specific sources, real-time Telegram notifications, and Firebase storage.

title: SVEC Cashless Fee System
subtitle: Blockchain-Based Receipt Verification
description: Digital fee collection system with secure, tamper-proof receipts using blockchain verification.

title: AI Chatbot for FAQs
subtitle: Natural Language Processing
description: Built a Python NLP chatbot with Flask. Handles 20+ FAQ categories for faster automation.

title: Portfolio Website
subtitle: Responsive Design
description: Personal portfolio built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Optimized for mobile devices.

title: Automated Internship Outreach Workflow
subtitle: n8n + Google Sheets + Gemini AI
description: A full automation pipeline built in n8n that reads founder/startup details from Google Sheets, generates personalized internship emails using Google Gemini AI, and sends them automatically via SMTP with tracking and logging.
